thread.title: BRIEF-Reg-Dbv Technologies Provides Update On Regulatory Progress For Viaskin Peanut

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Reg-Dbv Technologies Provides Update On Regulatory Progress For Viaskin Peanut

organizations.name: brief-reg-dbv technologies provides update on regulatory progress for viaskin peanut

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Dbv Technologies Sa:
* REG-DBV TECHNOLOGIES PROVIDES UPDATE ON REGULATORY PROGRESS FOR VIASKIN PEANUT
* FDA AGREED TO SUBMISSION OF A BIOLOGICS LICENSE APPLICATION (BLA) FOR TREATMENT OF PEANUT ALLERGY IN CHILDREN AGED 4 TO 11
* DBV REMAINS ON TRACK TO SUBMIT ITS BLA IN SECOND HALF OF 2018. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
